skill.name: update-docs
skill.description: Update all documentation in .plans, CLAUDE.md files, docs, and .tasks to match current codebase state. Use when user asks to update docs, refresh documentation, sync docs with code, or validate documentation accuracy.
skill.summary: Update all documentation in .plans, CLAUDE.md files, docs, and .tasks to match current codebase stat...
skill.author: Cygnusfear

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based documentation skill with no executable code. It uses standard MCP tools (Task, Read, Edit, Glob, Grep, Bash) for documentation operations. No network access, no environment variable collection, no external command execution. The skill's purpose (documentation updates) matches its documented capabilities exactly.

content.value_statement: Documentation drifts from codebase reality over time. This skill provides a systematic process to audit, update, and synchronize all documentation with current implementation state.
actual_capabilities: Find and catalog all documentation files across the codebase
Analyze documentation using Oracle subagent before making changes
Cross-reference documentation claims against actual code implementation
Update documentation while preserving critical knowledge and decisions
Validate plan documents against implementation status
Generate documentation update summary with change tracking
limitations: Does not modify code, only documentation files
Requires user approval for significant changes to historical content
Cannot access external resources or APIs
Does not create new documentation from scratch

use_cases.title: Documentation Sync
use_cases.description: Keep project documentation accurate after code changes by systematically reviewing and updating all docs

use_cases.title: Context Maintenance
use_cases.description: Maintain accurate context for AI assistants by ensuring CLAUDE.md and documentation reflect current architecture

use_cases.title: Documentation Audit
use_cases.description: Audit project documentation to identify gaps, outdated content, and inconsistencies across all doc files

prompt_templates.title: Full Doc Sync
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the update-docs skill to sync all documentation with current codebase state

prompt_templates.title: Single Doc Update
prompt_templates.prompt: Use update-docs to update CLAUDE.md and validate it against current code patterns

prompt_templates.title: Plan Status Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Use update-docs to check plan documents in .plans and mark completed items

prompt_templates.title: Doc Audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Use update-docs to perform a documentation audit and generate a coverage report

output_examples.input: Use update-docs to sync all documentation
output: ‚Ä¢ 3 files updated (status markers, version numbers, path references)
‚Ä¢ All preserved sections from Oracle analysis retained

best_practices: Always run Oracle analysis before modifying significant documentation
Verify documentation claims against actual code before updating
Preserve architectural decisions, historical context, and warnings
anti_patterns: Skipping Oracle analysis for documentation with historical context
Marking plans as done without verifying every item in code
Deleting or rewriting 'Why' and 'History' sections without approval

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Claude, Codex, and Claude Code all support this documentation skill through standard MCP tool access.

faq.question: How long does a full documentation sync take?
faq.answer: Time varies by codebase size. A typical project with 10-20 doc files completes in 5-15 minutes.

faq.question: How does Oracle analysis work?
faq.answer: The skill launches a subagent to analyze each document before modification, identifying critical knowledge to preserve.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads and edits documentation files within the project. No data is sent externally.

faq.question: What if documentation has broken links?
faq.answer: The skill validates internal links during Phase 3 and reports broken references in the summary output.

faq.question: How is this different from manual documentation review?
faq.answer: The skill provides a systematic process with Oracle analysis, preservation checks, and comprehensive change tracking.
